issue.title: rospy init_node does work second time through

content.raw: Can you post more information? Detail how you are trying to run multiple simulations.
content.html: Can you post more information? Detail how you are trying to run multiple simulations.

issue.title: rospy init_node does work second time through

content.raw:
Here are the two approaches.


Any help is appreciated

Trying to run optimization but can't run multiple simulations in python script.

this fails to init_node second time thru no error
throw exception when trying to call subscriber/publisher

loop:
    uuid = roslaunch.rlutil.get_or_generate_uuid(None, False)
    roslaunch.configure_logging(uuid)
    launch = roslaunch.parent.ROSLaunchParent(uuid, ['launchfile'])
    launch.start()

    rospy.init_node('walk')

    publisher/subscribers
    ....
    publisher/subscribers.unregister)

    rospy.signal_shutdown()

    launch.shutdown()

   
This gets  a flood of TF_OLD_DATA errors. Then fails a few times thru

roscore
   rospy.init_node()   # just once

   loop:
    uuid = roslaunch.rlutil.get_or_generate_uuid(None, False)
    roslaunch.configure_logging(uuid)
    launch = roslaunch.parent.ROSLaunchParent(uuid, ['launchfile'])
    launch.start()

    publisher/subscribers
    ....
    publisher/subscribers.unregister)

    launch.shutdown()


Here are the two approaches.
